actions.script:
fly: console.log('预算分摊-删除')
var arrayCtrl = Page.getArrayCtrl('预算分摊表格列表')
var checkedRows = arrayCtrl.getCheckedRows()
var indexPaths = []
checkedRows.forEach((item, i) => {
    indexPaths.push(item.indexPath)
})
arrayCtrl.deleteRows(indexPaths)
Page.getCtrl('移除预算分摊').disabled = '1'
Page.runEvent('预算分摊-计划费用-值改变')

Page.runEvent('陈列规则-清空')
Page.runEvent('奖励规则-清空')
Page.runEvent('营销组织-清空')
Page.runEvent('客户-清空')
